name: TALES OF DEAD WORLDS
effect: Any Impaired you apply to an enemy incurs 2 Difficulty, rather than 1. Any Shredded you apply to an enemy adds a flat 1 extra damage all instances of damage the target takes.

name: IMPOSITION OF AUTHORITY
effect: Any Slowed you apply to an enemy also prevents them from taking Full Actions. Any Immobilized you apply to an enemy also prevents them from taking Reactions.

name: SORE LOSER
effect: Once per round, when an enemy within Sensors succeeds at a save, you may cause them to take 3 AP energy damage as a reaction.

actions.name: SORE LOSER
actions.trigger: An enemy within Sensors succeeds at a save.
actions.detail: That enemy takes 3 AP Energy damage.

name: PHLOGISTON MUNITIONS
description: For when you need to cook them from the inside out.
effect: When you apply Burn, you may also apply an equal amount of Heat.

name: THERMOKINETIC CONVERTERS
effect: When you brace, you may take the final resulting damage as Heat instead of damage.

name: SPECIFIC-APPLICATION WEAPON DEVELOPMENT
effect: Gain a pool of 2 SP that may only be used for weapon mods. Weapons with an attached mod deal bonus damage equal to the SP cost of the mod.
